attributes.action: Fine MP's and Lords for sleeping in the house of commons/lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Watching Mps and lords sleeping on the job is not on .sleeping on the job would normally get everyone else the sack. A good on the spot fine and three penalty points would wake them up. get 12 penalty points in two years and that mp/Lord loses his/her sit until election day.
